iti108:2.1_1: bhikkhū kuhā thaddhā lapā siṅgī unnaḷā asamāhitā, na me te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū māmakā.
iti108:2.2_0: Apagatā ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmā dhammavinayā;
iti108:2.2_1: na ca te imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjanti.
iti108:2.3_1: bhikkhū nikkuhā nillapā dhīrā atthaddhā susamāhitā, te kho me, bhikkhave, bhikkhū māmakā.
iti108:2.4_0: Anapagatā ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmā dhammavinayā;
iti108:2.4_1: te ca imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjantī”ti.
iti108:5.1_0: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
